document_data.name: Tannivh Irithyl
document_data.mainbody:
{{see also|Irithyl}}
'''Tannivh Irithyl''' was fifth [[Coronal]] of [[Cormanthyr]], ruling from {{Yearlink|-791}} to {{Yearlink|-223}}. He is known for having successfully routed the [[drow]] from the [[Twisted Tower]] in {{Yearlink|-331}}, passing control of the tower to followers of [[Eilistraee]]. In gratitude to the reformed and surface-acclimatized drow who helped in the downfall of the tower, he granted them rights to settle remote woods east of [[Myth Drannor | Cormanthor]]. He died in {{Yearlink|-223}}, passing the rulership of the realm to his son, [[Eltargrim Irithyl]].
